title: nowo's ark
summary:
A simpler flood warning system using a pipe and a floating disk. During floods, the disk moves upward and contacts a button which sends a flood warning to local communities.  
Named Best Use of Cloudflare at HackSC, semi-finalist in the 2019 US-China Young Maker Competition, and 3rd Place in Soracom's Cellular IoT Challenge (LTE version)
